definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale
angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: After seeing the film the heroine in it swept Peter off his feet.
sentences.chinese: 看完电影之后，电影中的女主角让彼得心驰神往。

sentences.english: The hero of the story is in love with a woman who--alas and alack--does not love him.
sentences.chinese: 主角爱上了一位女子，可是那女子并不爱他。

sentences.english: He played the leading part of Othello in the tragedy.
sentences.chinese: 他在悲剧中扮演主角奥赛罗。

sentences.english: The actor for another leading character is reportedly to be selected from well-known Hong Kong stars.
sentences.chinese: 另一个男主角据报道会在香港一线明星当中选择。

sentences.english: At the end of the story, the protagonist emerges as a powerful pugilist.
sentences.chinese: 在故事的结尾，主角变成了一个强有力的拳击家。

sentences.english: The protagonist is a high school English teacher, 30, Nian sichuan.
sentences.chinese: 本剧的主角是一位30岁的高中英语教师鲇川。

sentences.english: Though a famous actor starred in the film , it is not well received.
sentences.chinese: 尽管一个著名演员担任主角，那个电影并不受欢迎。

sentences.english: He didn't feature in that movie.
sentences.chinese: 他在该电影中未演主角。

sentences.english: Would you not rather have your precious little ingenue?
sentences.chinese: 你们不想让你们那个机灵的小宝贝演主角了？

sentences.english: Mr. Greenblatt had a knack for working with female leads.
sentences.chinese: 格林布拉特先生深谙与女主角合作的诀窍。

sentences.english: Commerce has always played a central role on this east-west axis.
sentences.chinese: 在这条东西向的轴线上，商业总是扮演着主角。

sentences.english: Soprano Tan Jing and Lei Jia will perform the title role Mulan.
sentences.chinese: 这部歌剧将由女高音谭晶和雷佳扮演主角木兰。

sentences.english: Link may be the hero, but the game is named after Zelda.
sentences.chinese: 林克也许是主角，但是整个游戏是以塞尔达命名的。

sentences.english: Most heroines are neither beautiful nor knowledgeable.
sentences.chinese: 大部分女主角既不漂亮也没见识。

sentences.english: The dialog features Marcy, who works for Computer Solutions.
sentences.chinese: 对话的主角马尔西的职责是解决电脑的故障。

sentences.english: One legend features the Jade Emperor, also known as the Emperor of Heaven.
sentences.chinese: 有一个传说的主角是玉皇大帝，又称元始天尊。

definition: supporting role (in play, film etc)/minor role/to play a secondary role (in business etc)/to play second fiddle
hero (of a novel or film)/main protagonist
person/character (in a play, novel etc)/protagonist/CL:個|个[ge4]
role/character in a novel/persona/also pr. [jiao3 se4]
to play the role of/to act
scene (in a movie etc)/one's part in a movie or play/(archaic) actor's payment
heroine (of a novel or film)/main female protagonist
